title: Why Europe must reject Canada’s tack towards China
summary_full: Bargaining away tariffs on Chinese EVs in exchange for European pork or wine isn't symmetry; it is surrender. And with Beijing serving as Moscow’s banker, workshop, and components supplier, this would be unforgivable
summary_public: Bargaining away tariffs on Chinese EVs in exchange for European pork or wine isn't symmetry; it is surrender. And with Beijing serving as Moscow’s banker, workshop, and components supplier, this would be unforgivable

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Beijing serving as Moscow’s banker, workshop, and components supplier
